The home was very clean with everything I might need during my stay (shampoo, soap, laundry detergent, dishwasher detergent, etc.). The rooms are well decorated with comfortable beds and plenty of extra bedding if needed. I really appreciated having a king size bed - something I don't usually see in other Airbnbs. The living room was comfortably furnished. The kitchen had everything I needed for cooking at home. The basket filled with snacks was a nice touch. The home was spotless when I arrived. In addition to a lovely home in a nice area, Ami and Steve's hospitality was unmatched. They were quick in responding to my questions and gracious in offering to help me with anything that I needed during my stay. I highly recommend staying in this, or any of Ami and Steve's Airbnb homes, if you are in the area.
